mapper.sql: id, user_id, so_id, so_child_id, receiver_address_id, order_code, merchant_id, so_child_delivery_fee, package_type, delivery_code, delivery_status, delivery_mode, delivery_company_id, delivery_company_name, delivery_message, order_delivery_method_id, good_receiver_name, good_receiver_mobile, pro_city_area, delivery_date, good_receiver_address, delivery_name, delivery_name_mobile, sign_name, sign_date, sign_remark, update_time, create_time, platform_id
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM so_package where so_id=(select id from so where order_code=#{id})
SELECT delivery_company_name FROM so_package where so_child_id=#{soChildId} order by id limit 1
